name: test_e2e_with_logs[724_HHI_RESET_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_RESET_001` |
| **Name** | X-Forwarded-Host password reset hijack |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | password_reset |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `X-Forwarded-Host: evil.com/reset-password`
- **Encoded**: `X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com%2Freset-password`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:21:00.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=HHI_RESET_001-1772266860288-u0aa6w pattern_id=HHI_RESET_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com%2Freset-password client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=HHI_RESET_001-1772266860288-u0aa6w pattern_id=HHI_RESET_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com%2Freset-password client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
08:21:00.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=HHI_RESET_001-1772266860288-u0aa6w pattern_id=HHI_RESET_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com%2Freset-password client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
